TopicTitle: We've got a new recruit here...

Articles.Content:
Hello, my name is Mrsupersonic8!

Ok now quit staring at me.

I have a (dead) youtube account that goes by the same name, just with a M1ster instead of a Mr. here's the link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbN16za6ym01PJC0a5z9xIQ

O yeah, a few things to ask; How do I change my profile pic? Thanks to those who respond BTW!

Hello. Welcome to the forums.

As soon as you reach 5+ posts the spam protection bot won't think of you as a bot/spammer anymore. Then you can customize your own profile and even add an avatar!

If you think this helped, click the star button beside the "Blog this Post" button.

Happy launching!

As soon as you reach 5+ posts...

You sure? I thought it was 3? Anyway welcome to the forums!

You sure? I thought it was 3? Anyway welcome to the forums!

Or so I think it was. I couldn't remember. ^^"
